remarks: The function/constant operation expressed as an operation composition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ofcfval4.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
ofcfval4.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofcfval4.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. W ) $.
ofcfval4 $p |- ( ph -> ( F oFC R C ) = ( ( x e. B |-> ( x R C ) ) o. F ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d F x $.
$d R x $.
